name: damped-pendulum-interactive-phase-portrait
info:
# Interactive phase portrait of a damped pendulum

This example generates one phase trajectory of a damped pendulum each time users clicks on the image representing the phase plane.

The damped pendulum equation of motion is as follows:
$$
\ddot\varphi + 2n\dot\varphi + \frac gl \sin\varphi = 0
$$
It is similar to ?[simple pendulum](/doc#box/Pendulum),
but here we have the additional term $2n\dot\varphi$.

Interactive point input is performed by the ?[PointInput](/doc#box/PointInput) box.

Initial conditions for each phase trajectory are dumped to text file ```pts.txt```.
